critique: This document primarily deals with setting the rates of basic pay and salaries for various government employees, including those in the statutory pay systems, senior executive service, uniformed services, and locality-based comparability payments. It does not directly address issues related to immigration, executive power, federalism, national security, economic regulation, or social inclusion. Therefore, most of the axes should be scored as neutral. The ideological tilt is also neutral as it simply implements existing laws regarding pay scales.
